post.title: ft: google nexus one (att 3g bands) [want 9700, 3gs, pre plus...]
post.content: i have a nexus one that works with att 3g but can also be used for t-mobile. it comes with box and all original accessories along with a 4gb memory card. i am looking to trade for a nicer phone like the bold 9700 for att, iphone 3gs, att palm pre plus, or something nice. pm me if you have any questions. pics available upon request.
